column4: is there any different way from to fstab and manualy to mount dvd's with unhide option?
Nope, fstab is the way to handle those sort of things.

Yeah, some gnome magic.  It looks at /etc/fstab and if there is no entry for whatever you're mounting it makes a bunch of assumptions.  In order to change what it does you edit /etc/fstab.  Either that or change the source code and re-compile it to your liking.
